participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and friendly, loves to travel and has a great sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I wash my clothes weekly. pink is my favorite color. i have a cat named leela. i got off the road when i married my sweetheart. my favorite show is tom and jerry.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and enthusiastic about new experiences, eager to start college and explore life.
participant_2.background: I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. i am short. I'm going to visit my brother in another city. i love the band van haven. i have never been to the west coast of the united states.

content.text: Nothing much. I'm on my way to visit my brother in another city.
Oh that sounds fun! I love to travel.
Me too! I've never been to the west coast though.
Oh man, you should go! It's beautiful out there.
I will! I'm thinking about going to college out there.
That's awesome! What are you interested in studying?
I'm not sure yet. But I'm thinking about something in the medical field.
Oh that's great! I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
So, tell me more about your brother.
Well, he's my only sibling. We're pretty close.
That's good! How old is he?
Oh, so he's a little bit younger than you.
Yeah, he's a freshman in college.
That's great! Have fun visiting him.
